Posts.Content: Keep you head up! This trial will only make you stronger and we are all here for you!
Posts.Title: worried with my breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi all! I'm part of Margo Rey's street team, trying to raise awareness for Brides Against Breast Cancer, a great organization that is helping people all across the nation who have had their lives impacted with cancer by raising money for education, information, and outreach services to cancer patients and their families. Through Brides Agsinst Breast Cancer, people have the chance to donate wedding dresses, as well as purchase them at great prices.  Margo, a two-time breast cancer survivor and bride-to-be, will be attending select bridal shows across the country and providing the campaign's theme song with her single "Let It Rain." Margo believes no one should go through cancer alone, and wants to be there to support those who need it most. If you'd like to learn more about Brides Against Breast Cancer and the great work they do, visit here: Listen to Margo Rey’s new theme song, “Let The Rain,” for Brides Against Breast Cancer here: http://bit.ly/14jGtgQ. Also, Listen to Margo Rey’s new theme song, “Let The Rain,” for Brides Against Breast Cancer here: https://soundcloud.com/margorey/3-let-the-rain.   Thank you!
Posts.Title: Brides Against Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Sorry the links got messed up at the bottom! Information about the Brides Against Breats Cancer can be found here: http://bit.ly/14jGtgQ. Also, the link to "Let The Rain" can be found here: https://soundcloud.com/margorey/3-let-the-rain.   Thanks!
Posts.Title: Brides Against Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Keep you head up! This trial will only make you stronger and we are all here for you!
Posts.Title: worried with my breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hey everyone! My name is Margo Rey, and I'm currently on my second of four rounds of chemo treatments. I made this video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A6HvG4-exIY ...in the hopes of giving back some inspiration to those who've inspired me. I'm also a musician and am sharing my journey with all of my fans. I'd really appreciate it if you took a few seconds to check out my music right here: soundcloud.com /margorey I'm hope someday to be a source of inspiration and motivation. Embrace the mohawk ladies!! Thanks!
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Patient Musician

Posts.Content: Hi everyone! Inspired by my recent honor as a National Ambassador for Brides Against Breast Cancer, I've started Chemo-Glam" video series to share my journey. Please feel free to check out some of the videos here https://vimeo.com/channels/chemoglam.
Posts.Title: Chemo-Glam

Posts.Content: You'll do great Sharon! Just keep your head up and stay strong!
